statement.p: A subscription plan for a GPS tracking device costs 14.99 per month plus 0.10 per location ping (sent once every 10 minutes). What is the monthly charge if the device was used for 2 hours and 35 minutes?

solution.p: First, we need to know how many pings are sent in 2 hours and 35 minutes. This is a total of \displaystyle{2}\cdot{60}+{35}={155} minutes. This is \displaystyle\frac{{155}}{{10}}={15.5} 10 minute periods. Any time past the last 10 minute segment does not generate another ping so only 15 pings will be sent.
